question: What is the name of the multimedia guide on Covid-19, that was launched by the Union Health minister?
explanation:
Union Health Minister of India Harsh Vardhan has recently launched 'COVID Katha', a multimedia guide on the Covid-19 disease.
On the occasion of the 50th Foundation Day of Department of Science and Technology (DST), the Union Minister launched this guide. He also interacted with heads of all Autonomous Institutions and Subordinate offices of DST, through video conferencing.
